sentence: In the gubernatorial election, President Trumps endorsement propelled conservative State Sen. Doug Mastriano to victory.
author: David N. Bossie
title: Pennsylvania proves Republicans still want 'America First'

sentence: Pennsylvania Republicans picked state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) as their nominee for governor, nearly three months to the day after the select House committee investigating the insurrection issued him a subpoena seeking his testimony.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republican election deniers make gains in primary contests
